Description: Redware tall slender jar. Pointed base, ovoid body, long neck and rolled rim. Repaired from fragments, the jar is decorated with nads of blue lotus petals, interspersed with parallel bands of blue divided into rectangles, some outlined with red or black paint.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, Main City North, R45.26
Curator's comments: Published (with parallels), in P. Rose, The Eighteenth Dynasty Pottery Corpus from Amarna (MEES 83, London, 2007): 91, fig.48, 231 [no.359].
